resources.string:
The only source for new apps that your device knows is your app store. But this app is going to build a app for you right here on your device. To install that new app, you need to tell your device to allow installation of apps from unknown sources. 

Enabling Unknown Sources does not allow apps to be installed without your explicit case by case consent. You will still be shown a list of special permissions requested by an app and asked if you want to install it. You should always pay close attention to the permissions list, especially if you're allowing unknown sources. 

Clicking "OK" will take you to the settings screen where you can check the box to allow "Unknown Sources."
설치 실패!\n 설치화면에서 멀리 떨어지지 마세요.
설치 할 수 없습니다. 다시 시도 하세요.
